recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with meat sauce
instructions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add a generous pinch of salt and the spaghetti. Cook according to package instructions.

Meanwhile, heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the beef and cook, breaking it up with a wooden spoon, until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes.
Drain the pasta and divide between 4 bowls. Top with the sauce and Parmesan cheese.
